docs.snippet: A bipartisan group of governors called on Congress to ratify the Trans-Pacific Partnership on Friday despite opposition from both leading presidential candidates....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bipartisan group of governors called on Congress to ratify the Trans-Pacific Partnership on Friday despite opposition from both leading presidential candidates.

headline.main: Bipartisan Governors Group Wants Trade Pact Ratified
headline.print_headline: Bipartisan Governors Group Wants Trade Pact Ratified

docs.snippet: After frenzied, final decision-making, Donald Trump announced Indiana Gov. Mike Pence as his running mate Friday, adding an experienced politician with deep Washington connections to the Republican presidential ticket....
docs.lead_paragraph: After frenzied, final decision-making, Donald Trump announced Indiana Gov. Mike Pence as his running mate Friday, adding an experienced politician with deep Washington connections to the Republican presidential ticket.

headline.main: Pence Wins Trump's Vote; GOP Team Addresses America Saturday
headline.print_headline: Pence Wins Trump's Vote; GOP Team Addresses America Saturday

docs.snippet: A failed bill to help fight the Zika virus was among the high-profile casualties as partisan fights continued Thursday even as legislators were leaving town....
docs.lead_paragraph: A failed bill to help fight the Zika virus was among the high-profile casualties as partisan fights continued Thursday even as legislators were leaving town.
docs.abstract: Congress heads to seven-week recess, leaving behind series of partisan fights, failed bill to fight Zika virus, impasse over gun safety and few mundane accomplishments.

headline.main: Congress Recesses, Leaving More Stalemates Than Accomplishments
headline.print_headline: Congress Hits Recess With Trail of Impasses

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

docs.snippet: Republican Donald Trump's selection of Indiana Governor Mike Pence as his running mate cheered the U.S. energy industry and dismayed green advocates, with both sides citing Pence's support for coal mining and defiance of President Barack Obama's c...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Donald Trump's selection of Indiana Governor Mike Pence as his running mate cheered the U.S. energy industry and dismayed green advocates, with both sides citing Pence's support for coal mining and defiance of President Barack Obama's climate-change agenda.

headline.main: Trump's Expected VP Pick: Coal Advocate Who Defied Obama's Climate Agenda
headline.print_headline: Trump's Expected VP Pick: Coal Advocate Who Defied Obama's Climate Agenda

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton enters the summer damaged by perceptions that she violated the law by using a private email system while serving as secretary of state, a new Associated Press-GfK poll finds....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton enters the summer damaged by perceptions that she violated the law by using a private email system while serving as secretary of state, a new Associated Press-GfK poll finds.

headline.main: AP-GfK Poll: Email Investigation Has Hurt Clinton's Image
headline.print_headline: AP-GfK Poll: Email Investigation Has Hurt Clinton's Image
